title: Will league run faster on a windows 10 64bits pc? What are the effects?
body:
(plz heeeelp me the powerful league community!!)
I don't know if there's a board for tech problems so I post it here (i hope this is the right place)
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
yeah, I'm so stupid at tech stuff...
I'm currently using a laptop with an x64 processor but I'm still living with 32bits right now.
So I'm planning to update my 32bits laptop into 64 bits, I wonder will the 64-bit effect the performance of league of legends, video editing on Adobe premiere, photoshop, and Java (welp apparently I can't live without them)
